# SOAP  
DOC: 
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XXJFNYHe0Gjl2Eywi-8kEpzPg3Q0NHFV/edit?rtpof=true

### Only v_1_4 called by InoviceInfo_V2.5. 
so we don't set it up here.

parameters.description: or use 218650458 to see if maxDebitAmt

status.systemErrorTxt: ServiceException was received from WPS service (errorCode=AV100001, message={ID:11145045161626642476931,ERROR CODE:100001} 100001: System Error. Please contact technical support or fix the error described in the response.). This error code with "AV" prefix is an error thrown from Avalon. Please contact the Avalon team for support.

schema.example:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wir="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/srv/CMO/ReceivablesMgmt/WirelessPaymentServiceRequestResponse_v1" xmlns:v1="http://schemas.telus.com/avalon/common/v1_0" xmlns:ent="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Enterprise/BaseTypes/EnterpriseCommonTypes_v9">
   <soapenv:Header>

                                     <eui:endUserIdentityHeader xmlns:eui="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Enterprise/Security/EndUserIdentity_v1" principal="SOA Application Identity\APP_HWREDTOOL">
                                                <eui:applUserId>x109821</eui:applUserId>
                                </eui:endUserIdentityHeader>

      <wir:UserHeader>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <v1:custId>?</v1:custId>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <v1:ipAddress>?</v1:ipAddress>
         <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
         <v1:appInfo>
            <v1:userId>?</v1:userId>
            <v1:applicationId>?</v1:applicationId>
            <v1:ipAddress>?</v1:ipAddress>
         </v1:appInfo>
      </wir:UserHeader>
   </soapenv:Header>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <wir:processDeposit>
         <wir:creditCardTransaction>
            <wir:banId>?</wir:banId>
            <wir:transactionType>CCV</wir:transactionType>
            <wir:amount>?</wir:amount>
            <wir:creditCard>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <ent:token>?</ent:token>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <ent:first6>?</ent:first6>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <ent:cardType>
                  <ent:code>?</ent:code>
                  <!--0 to 10 repetitions:-->
                  <ent:description>
                     <ent:locale>?</ent:locale>
                     <ent:descriptionText>?</ent:descriptionText>
                  </ent:description>
               </ent:cardType>
               <ent:last4>?</ent:last4>
               <ent:expiryMonth>?</ent:expiryMonth>
               <ent:expiryYear>?</ent:expiryYear>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <ent:cardVerificationData>?</ent:cardVerificationData>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <ent:holderName>?</ent:holderName>
            </wir:creditCard>
            <wir:chargeAuthorizationNumber>?</wir:chargeAuthorizationNumber>
            <wir:creditCardHolder>
               <wir:clientId>?</wir:clientId>
               <wir:firstName>?</wir:firstName>
               <wir:lastName>?</wir:lastName>
               <wir:civicStreetNumber>?</wir:civicStreetNumber>
               <wir:streetName>?</wir:streetName>
               <wir:apartmentNumber>?</wir:apartmentNumber>
               <wir:city>?</wir:city>
               <wir:province>?</wir:province>
               <wir:postalCode>?</wir:postalCode>
               <wir:homePhone>?</wir:homePhone>
               <wir:birthDate>?</wir:birthDate>
               <wir:businessRole>?</wir:businessRole>
               <wir:activationDate>?</wir:activationDate>
               <wir:accountType>?</wir:accountType>
               <wir:accountSubType>?</wir:accountSubType>
            </wir:creditCardHolder>
            <wir:brandId>1</wir:brandId>
         </wir:creditCardTransaction>
         <wir:paymentSourceType>?</wir:paymentSourceType>
         <wir:paymentSourceId>?</wir:paymentSourceId>
         <wir:notificationSuppressionInd>true</wir:notificationSuppressionInd>
         <wir:auditInfo>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:userId>?</ent:userId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:userTypeCode>?</ent:userTypeCode>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:salesRepresentativeId>?</ent:salesRepresentativeId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:channelOrganizationId>?</ent:channelOrganizationId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:outletId>?</ent:outletId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:originatorApplicationId>?</ent:originatorApplicationId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:correlationId>?</ent:correlationId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:timestamp>?</ent:timestamp>
         </wir:auditInfo>
      </wir:processDeposit>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wir="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/srv/CMO/ReceivablesMgmt/WirelessPaymentServiceRequestResponse_v1" xmlns:v1="http://schemas.telus.com/avalon/common/v1_0" xmlns:ent="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Enterprise/BaseTypes/EnterpriseCommonTypes_v9">
   <soapenv:Header>

                                     <eui:endUserIdentityHeader xmlns:eui="http://xmlschema.tmi.telus.com/xsd/Enterprise/Security/EndUserIdentity_v1" principal="SOA Application Identity\APP_HWREDTOOL">
                                                <eui:applUserId>x109821</eui:applUserId>
                                </eui:endUserIdentityHeader>

      <wir:UserHeader>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <v1:custId>?</v1:custId>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <v1:ipAddress>?</v1:ipAddress>
         <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
         <v1:appInfo>
            <v1:userId>?</v1:userId>
            <v1:applicationId>?</v1:applicationId>
            <v1:ipAddress>?</v1:ipAddress>
         </v1:appInfo>
      </wir:UserHeader>
   </soapenv:Header>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <wir:processDeposit>
         <wir:creditCardTransaction>
            <wir:banId>?</wir:banId>
            <wir:transactionType>CCV</wir:transactionType>
            <wir:amount>?</wir:amount>
            <wir:creditCard>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <ent:token>?</ent:token>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <ent:first6>?</ent:first6>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <ent:cardType>
                  <ent:code>?</ent:code>
                  <!--0 to 10 repetitions:-->
                  <ent:description>
                     <ent:locale>?</ent:locale>
                     <ent:descriptionText>?</ent:descriptionText>
                  </ent:description>
               </ent:cardType>
               <ent:last4>?</ent:last4>
               <ent:expiryMonth>?</ent:expiryMonth>
               <ent:expiryYear>?</ent:expiryYear>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <ent:cardVerificationData>?</ent:cardVerificationData>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <ent:holderName>?</ent:holderName>
            </wir:creditCard>
            <wir:chargeAuthorizationNumber>?</wir:chargeAuthorizationNumber>
            <wir:creditCardHolder>
               <wir:clientId>?</wir:clientId>
               <wir:firstName>?</wir:firstName>
               <wir:lastName>?</wir:lastName>
               <wir:civicStreetNumber>?</wir:civicStreetNumber>
               <wir:streetName>?</wir:streetName>
               <wir:apartmentNumber>?</wir:apartmentNumber>
               <wir:city>?</wir:city>
               <wir:province>?</wir:province>
               <wir:postalCode>?</wir:postalCode>
               <wir:homePhone>?</wir:homePhone>
               <wir:birthDate>?</wir:birthDate>
               <wir:businessRole>?</wir:businessRole>
               <wir:activationDate>?</wir:activationDate>
               <wir:accountType>?</wir:accountType>
               <wir:accountSubType>?</wir:accountSubType>
            </wir:creditCardHolder>
            <wir:brandId>1</wir:brandId>
         </wir:creditCardTransaction>
         <wir:paymentSourceType>?</wir:paymentSourceType>
         <wir:paymentSourceId>?</wir:paymentSourceId>
         <wir:notificationSuppressionInd>true</wir:notificationSuppressionInd>
         <wir:auditInfo>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:userId>?</ent:userId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:userTypeCode>?</ent:userTypeCode>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:salesRepresentativeId>?</ent:salesRepresentativeId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:channelOrganizationId>?</ent:channelOrganizationId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:outletId>?</ent:outletId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:originatorApplicationId>?</ent:originatorApplicationId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:correlationId>?</ent:correlationId>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <ent:timestamp>?</ent:timestamp>
         </wir:auditInfo>
      </wir:processDeposit>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
